Changelog
------------

1.1 (2012-10-05)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Tests with Plone 4.2 and 4.3.
- Fix urls for images in theme.css to work on debug mode and... production mode !
- Update tests, add some test buildouts and code coverage.


1.0.1 (2012-06-11)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Add a basic test and a dedicated buildout.cfg.


1.0 (2012-06-06)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Initial release.
